verbose_text: Considering the prevalence of stroke in hyperlipidemic patients, the present study aimed to clarify whether PCSK9 contributes to the exacerbation of ischemic brain apoptosis induced by middle cerebral artery occlusion (MCAO) injury in hyperlipidemic mice.
evidence: PCSK9 contributes to the exacerbation of ischemic brain apoptosis induced by middle cerebral artery occlusion (MCAO) injury
